website_summaries.verdict: A larger, more powerful space heater model that's just as portable and easy to transport as our other picks.
pros: Multiple settings allow users to select between different wattage modes to adjust amount of heat projected
There's also a handy fan mode for when the office gets a bit too warm
Has a safety feature to prevent overheating and has a handle for transport
cons: A little louder than other models

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful little heater. I bought it to keep my desk area warm while I'm studying but it raises the temp in my entire 12x20ft bedroom by a noticeable amount, works great! I love that it fits so easily on my desk, takes up hardly any space.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work or home.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a motorhome in a town where the temperature in the morning hovers around 32 degrees and my RV is not well insulated. I don't want to run my propane heater at night so I have my heater next to my bed. As soon as I wake up in the morning, it is freezing outside, I turn on the heater and am comfortable in a matter of minutes. When I get out of bed and start working on my computer, I move the heater to my work area and it keeps me comfortable. It is quiet and very efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Nom de plume

customer_reviews.title: Returned heater received, but seems to work well.
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to order a reasonably priced heater with so many features. When I removed the heater from the product box, clearly, it was a unit that had been returned. The cord was refolded. At first, I thought the heater was defective, but I realized that I needed to turn up the thermostat, so the fan would turn on. The fan definitely blows sufficiently and heats well, even on the low setting. The tip feature works well. Some of the heating elements are bent. So far, I am pleased with the heater, just not pleased that I received a return.
customer_reviews.author: Adopt a Shelter Pet

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little heater for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a stock room with absolutely no heat in Chicago. I was extremely skeptical of this purchase but surprisingly this little heater keeps me comfortable throughout my whole shift. I do work within 10 feet of it at all times but I even got too hot one day and had to turn it down. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Villa

customer_reviews.title: I think it is a terrible product. I bought it for my office
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a terrible product. I bought it for my office, and I can't work there with the noise. And it is not that good to heat a medium size room. I guess it would work only if you put it under the table to heat your feet...
customer_reviews.author: nineu

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last more than a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: The first heater arrived defective with the safety button being too short so that it was constantly shutting off. I returned that heater and ordered a new one. This one has a loose part inside that cannot be taken out so it rattles every time I turn it on. Now the heater intermittently shuts off just like the first heater and I have only had it for a couple months. I was going to order another one but it is now past the time that I can return it and it is no longer available. I am very disappointed in this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Good heater
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be working fine so far. It is not very loud and seems to be keeping the room warm enough. I have had it about a month. I purchased the extended warranty so that if it dies as some reviews state I can return it. Hopefully, it will continue to work as well as it is now. It is sturdy and I hope it works out.
customer_reviews.author: MayaTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Take my word for it
customer_reviews.text: Used this heater for 2 months before it gave out on me. Invest into a better one than this piece of crap. Although it was very good when it was working. It also had a fan option which was decent for a small room. Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.author: MzThing2u

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my home office
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my office. My home office is at the front of the house and can get drafty and cool compared to the rest of the house. This mini heater is the perfect size and gives up great heat even at the level II setting. Makes a light fan sound. . You can control the setting as level I, II or Fan. You also can turn up or down the heat temp. it automatically goes off if you lift it and move it or if it falls on the floor. My dog already has tripped over the cord and knocked it down twice, great safety feature.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Small but Mighty
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet and works really well. I've only used it at full power but it has a thermostat (- for colder, + for warmer) so you can control the temperature. It's small but heats my entire bedroom (15' x 20') by itself. I ordered the one that looked almost blue/grey but it came in silver. Otherwise I'm really happy overall with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PaigeL

customer_reviews.title: Worthless Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: The thermostat is so non sensitive as to be worthless plus the fan is really noisy.
customer_reviews.author: airstream

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to heat my cube since the office is an icebox. 1) there are two temperature settings... either the 10th circle of hell or a light cool breeze, can't seem to just be warm and toasty 2) Not sure if this is for all or just the unit i received but the knob that indicates the level it's on doesn't let me put it on low. Once i go below even the half way point it shuts off completely. 3) This thing is loud. Wish I didn't throw out the box already or i'd send back :/
customer_reviews.author: KristiNJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good bet for this price range
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of 750/1500W heaters that turn out roughly the same heat. This is one of the better ones. PROS: Fairly small size; Oscillates size to side to heat the room better; Tip over turns it off. My wife says it looks like a happy fave (see top). CONS: There are a few smaller (but they don't oscillate); The tip over is via a button rather than mercury switch. This might have problems in deep carpet. The ones have have this are twice the price, though. All in all, a very good bet for this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stone

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 9 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Heater was great while it lasted. I've had it for about 9 weeks and I've been using it for about 8 hours a day five days a week, in my office. On Friday, it was working fine. In the late afternoon, I turned it off for the weekend. When I came in Monday morning and turned it on, it immediately began emitting an alarming screeching sound. I have to assume it is a hazard. Moreover, even if the sound does not indicate a danger of catching fire, I obviously cannot use it in an office environment making the kind of racket it makes.
customer_reviews.author: NHalpern

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 uses.  Junk.  Returned.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t recommend a space heater that starts having internal glitches after 3 uses. While using the heater on a low heat setting, the casing got very hot and the fan stopped blowing altogether. Even when it did function, the tilt sensor did not work very well on carpet, as it tripped itself multiple times standing perfectly upright. Piece of junk. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: this product has been really nice. We live in Texas so we don’t use ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, this product has been really nice. We live in Texas so we don’t use it too often, but on the occasional cold night, I do like to have it in my son’s nursery. It’s a small 11’ x 12’ room, and this heater keeps it nice and cozy warm on low. I’ve been very happy with it so far and will update if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: Liz S.

customer_reviews.title: Not for overnight use
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the 3 full nights I had until the bottom “tip-over protector” button stopped working and didn’t allow the heater to activate... I look at the bottom of the product to find the button loose and flimsy , and wouldn’t turn on even when pressure was applied to it. If you plan on getting this, don’t rely on it to be used overnight ; more like when you’re taking a shower or for very small rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't heat a very big area
customer_reviews.text: This heater is OK. It's light and the safety features are nice. The problem is it doesn't blow very hot air and doesn't heat up a very big space. It would work OK for a small bathroom or under a desk to keep your feet warm. I wanted it for warming a bedroom and I can't even tell that it's on. It wasn't even that cold. I just wanted it to take the chill out in the morning before the furnace was turned on for the winter. I really couldn't feel that it had warmed the room up any and it's not a huge bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kohout

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more if you don't want to be cold and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mother so she could put it in her bathroom so she could turn it on in the morning and warm up her bathroom it's a small room maybe seven by seven ran for over an hour and barely took the chill off the problem is I live in Florida the day I ordered it it was necessary it was almost a month before it was necessary again the return window has closed
customer_reviews.author: kevorlandoSHOCKED

customer_reviews.title: Broken after ONE WEEK
customer_reviews.text: Received the heater on August 12th, 2018. By August 19th, 2018 I began experiencing the following complications: -Turned off circuit breaker due to high voltage (huge inconvenience!! all the power connected to that circuit goes out) -Turns on and off as it pleases- will literally be on and then randomly turn off and then 10 minutes later will turn on -Fan setting never worked This heater is very warm and I really liked it, too bad it doesn't work properly. Will be returning!! Thankfully the warranty lasts until September 11, 2018. Today is August 30, 2018 so I have some time left.
customer_reviews.author: Playgirl Laidback

customer_reviews.title: Heats, but not quietly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little heater because my bedroom gets really cold at night and I wanted to make sure my little dogs were warm enough. This machine definitely warms up the room, but it is anything but quiet. The couple times I had it running overnight it disturbed my sleep several times, so I stopped running it while I slept. Now I run it for a couple hours before bedtime - the room is definitely warm when we go in there, but that heat doesn't last all night. This would have been perfect if it was actually quiet.
customer_reviews.author: LilyoftheThorns

customer_reviews.title: So-So Heater
customer_reviews.text: If you will be placing this on carpet, you'll need something solid to set it on. The tip-over feature is very sensitive, so mine won't even work unless it's on a hard surface. It does give out decent heat. However, it's way too noisy for me. I read reviews that said it was quiet. But I'm disappointed. It's not nearly as quiet as the one I'm replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I needed a heater for work because it's always freezing in the office, but this heater stopped working after one week of use. I sent the heater back, and the company sent me a replacement heater. The replacement heater was pre used and it kept shutting on and off until finally it stopped working after one day of use. I will be returning this heater for a full refund, this thing is poorly made, spend a couple extra dollars and get a better quality heater... On to the next.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 Broke within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The heater itself works great, but the safety feature that shuts off the heater if it is tipped over is terrible. I purchased 3 of these. Within one week one of the heaters safety clips broke off (very cheap). Within another 2 months the other 2 heaters no longer work because the spring doesn't work on the safety piece. Heater is fantastic, the safety feature is cheap and breaks very easily. I would never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: what a let down
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to work fine the first few times, I used the fan and low heat setting. When I used the high setting it overheated its self and shut off (safety feature). It took a while for it to be usable again, and cannot be used on high. On low it only works with the thermostat up almost all the way, I thought I could turn it down to have it come on and off, but it doesn't seem to be the case, even when it is quite cold in the room. Wish I had spent a little more money and bought a better heater.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after the heater that I used for years stopped working. This is one of the best purchases I have made! I only use this for my bedroom and even though it is small, it warms up the room quick! EDIT: Horrible experience! Everytime I would use it there was a burning plastic smell and now I know why. After not even 3 months of use, I heard a loud pop and sparks flying everywhere at 1AM! I'm lucky I was awake when it happened and my room didn't catch on fire. Save your money and do not buy this product! You are better off buying another heater!!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Equator or glacier? No in between.
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered a couple of these things and wow. Wish I’d returned em. In theory they’re awesome - automatically turns off when you move it or it tips, good heat output, nifty little knob for temperature maintenance...then you really pay attention to it. That nifty knob is great, but doesn’t seem too intuitive at times. The room ends up either a glacier or a sauna. You try and put it on the first hear setting and half the thing blows out cold air! I’m sorry, what? Why? Why is this a thing?! This shouldn’t be a thing. Maybe I just got a (few) defective one(s), but dang...try another one. :-/
customer_reviews.author: Tara B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: This heater stopped working about 6 months after getting it. I got it for my son last Xmas and already have to buy another one. Very disappointed. Update: brightown contacted me after seeing my review and offered to either send a new space heater or refund my account. I was very impressed by this and have to support a company that follows through with their customers in this way.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, when it worked!
customer_reviews.text: This product kicked out lots of heat, kept a large bedroom warm, and the safety feature would shut it off once it got too hot, but the room was plenty warm enough so it was fine. Obviously it was not used all summer, never did check out the fan option. Had it for a year, and the heat went out in our home, so while waiting for HVAC guy to come, I pulled this out and it was blowing cold air! Could not get it to blow warm air so it did no good when it was 35 outside and the house was at 60 degrees for hours. So it ended up being junk.
customer_reviews.author: Evie N

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: This company is great. I purchased two heaters from them and after a week, one became defective. I e-mailed their customer service and a couple of weeks after I received a brand new replacement unit at the office. No question asked. No shipping fee. No return request. Free of charge. I called this excellent customer service. The units are working wonderfully. I used them for my office and have been using them everyday. Very powerful heater, perfect white noise to cover private conversations. What i also like about the unit is the internal controller that allow the unit to keep the office at a set temperature. I will definitely recommend this unit and will buy again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Tauocaros

customer_reviews.title: Safety, security and warmth
customer_reviews.text: I love the compact size as I am in a tiny house and its perfect. Also, the safety features that turn it off if overheating, tilted during usage and more. It gives me a secure feeling knowing I am safe. It heats beautifully at a lower temperature (not to much) and much more when needed. A tad bit louder in a smaller space. However, perfect in every way other than that. I am sure in a larger space it would not be that noticeable. Thank you for creating such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Love

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Beware, this thing is trash. It quit working properly after a few months but I still get it to work by hitting it and prolong it up on its side or upside down. Save your cash and get a better heater because this isn’t it. I think it is designed very poorly. It’s sad that so many things are designed poorly, because this plastic heater will eventually end up in a landfill.... My “hack” to make this work (hitting it, flipping it around) is just my refusal to throw it out but if I could go back in time if just buy a better quality heater.
customer_reviews.author: a. n.

customer_reviews.title: My Best Friend at Work!
customer_reviews.text: Perfection! Love this little guy and how safe it is! It cools down so quickly after turning it off. I work in a studio in which we have to keep the heat off because my clients are lifting copius amounts of weight. This brings their body temperature up, so we keep the heat off. However, us trainers, particularly me, is really cold due to lack of intense movement. We have one, small enclosed office that I keep this heater in. It warms it up so fast. It's nice to escape to when I have a break. Warms up so quick. It also weighs nothing!!
customer_reviews.author: DorienGrais

customer_reviews.title: Heater stopped working after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked using this heater in my small room, it did a great job at heating it up. However, after about 3 months of using it sometimes it would just randomly shut off and not turn back on for a few hours, which I figured was a safety feature, even though it was cold in the room. Then, after 9 months (I bought in December) it stopped turning on entirely. In October, I contacted their sales team through email asking if I could have a replacement, but I didn't receive a response. I reached out again, hoping they will stand by their 1-year guarantee, I will update this review if they respond.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: puts out a lot of heat / louder than expected
customer_reviews.text: Pros: puts out much more heat than expected from such a small machine. Worth the price if you just want heat. Cons: Much more noise than expected. It also seems to only have one heat temperature no matter how many different settings I tried.
customer_reviews.author: justanotherreader

customer_reviews.title: This fan is awesome
customer_reviews.text: We use it next to our changing table so baby won't be cold during diaper changes in winter. It only takes a few seconds to warm up and the heat at level I is comfortable. This was a lifesaver and he stopped wailing during diaper changes, even seemed to enjoy the warm air blowing on his bare butt : ).We didn't need to go the level II because that would be too hot on the baby, but I imagine it could heat up a room pretty fast if needed. The fan was so nice I even posted a mini review on my own social media.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia T.

customer_reviews.title: Only Lasted A Little Over 3 Months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in late November of 2018 and it broke in March of 2019. It was only used occasionally on very cold nights. Tried to contact seller but got no response. When it worked it worked well, heat output was excellent, safety features worked well, and temperature controls were easy to use. But due to its short life span I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andy H.

customer_reviews.title: Best Space Heater She's used Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my girl who is a banker at a desk all day which faces the front double doors and in the colder months she can really feel that cool air coming in. Now she is happy at her desk even on cold days as this heater is perfect in size, output, and it is good looking too. Another feature she likes is that it doubles as a fan for the summer months. Very happy with this design and the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Skaggs

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: After three months the heater stopped working. It is no longer warrantied under Amazon, one the manufacturer. Buyer beware. I would not recommend this product. 1/1/2020 Update. The company sent me a second heater after the original one stopped working after 3 months. The new heater no longer works either. Don't waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best little heater!
customer_reviews.text: I have a grinch roommate who will not let us turn on the house heater, so I bought this to keep from freezing. I don't know much about space heaters, but this one had the best safety reviews. It warms up my 10×12 underground room (with concreat walls!) very quick and snuggly and keeps the room at a perfect temperature. I like that as a safety feature, the heater will turn off automatically if it is not resting flat on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Not stable. Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I bought this because it was listed as having a thermostat. Meaning when it reach the desired temperature it shut off. This was not the case. It moves when it oscillates and now after about a month it doesn't work AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: MorningGloryTori

customer_reviews.title: It was working great until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: We used this in our baby's room and it heated it so well our baby slept soundly. It is somewhat noisy. You do get a distinct hum from the fan. The heat is immediate though. Another nice thing is it's very receptive to it being tipped or moved, which is helpful with a little one. Puts the mind at ease. The unfortunate thing is after only two months it just stopped working entirely-- and on one of the colder days in our home. This doesn't seem like a reliable product, but maybe it was just ours? But the price is great for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Soria

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for longevity? Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two heaters. They worked great out if the box. Easy to use, great features and put out a lot of heat. The first one died after two weeks if use, the second died after a month and a half. Company was unresponsive to emails and could not find a number for phone support.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Earhart

customer_reviews.title: Good product and ignore the negative reviews
customer_reviews.text: I use it to heat my shower area before taking one and it works just fine. What drove me nuts was the negative reviews that made the decision to purchase it slow. Folks, it is a small space heater and if you are working in a cubby in a warehouse it is not likely to work for you. Likewise, it if you are a Prime member and it comes defective then return it for a new one and don't complain because a mass-produced product that is inexpensive did not work. It happens, so get over it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: When I got it the thermostat did not work. It would turn off when it got warm enough but never turn back on. Now a little over a month after I 1st purchased it, it no longer works at all, will not turn on, no power.
customer_reviews.author: dragon

customer_reviews.title: This was great- til it suddenly died
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this unit: performed as advertised, it was relatively quiet, heated up my small bathroom space and I could adjust the temperature. However, after just a year, with no warning signs, it just died!! I used this mainly in the winter months so from May til Oct, it was back its box. Very disappointed. Went out and purchased a DeLonghi, with a warrantee. This works great- so far
customer_reviews.author: Satellitegirl06

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, died after a year.
customer_reviews.text: I really want to give this heater 5 stars, because the thing worked great! However, I've had it for 13 months, and only used it intermittently over a 2 month period last year, and ive used it intermittently over the past 3 months. It has died. I was expecting much longer use out of it. I have a cheap space heater from Walmart that I bought 7 years ago that is still running great.
customer_reviews.author: JulieM1990

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size to tuck behind my desk at work for those days where the commercial heating system "thinks" it is the perfect temperature, but it's just a little too chilly for my liking. Adjustable temperature and fan, and it turns off when it reaches the selected temperature in the room. It is easy enough to move between the office and home when needed as well, and has an auto shut-off in case one of our pets knocks it over while it's running.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it won’t last
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I’ve had this space heater a couple weeks. It does heat up a room very quickly. However, it does not last at all. Very cheap. Within the first couple days of having the heater it stopped working. I thought it just over heated so I let it rest. But it took several hours before it would turn back on. The second week in it has completely quit. Spend a little more money and get a better quality space heater.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t even turn on, waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had listened to the other reviews! This was absolute garbage! The day we received it we followed all instructions properly and it turned on once for a few seconds then wouldn’t turn on again (and not because it was “heat cycling” as the instructions said - the room was freezing and there was no way it had warmed it up in the two seconds it was on). Sending it back immediately and going to Lowe’s to buy one instead. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Heater for Small Room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a small room in my basement that doesn’t get as warm as the rest of the house. I chose this one because my sister has one, is happy with it, and it was within my price range. I’ve had it for just over a week, have used it everyday, and it gives off enough heat to warm up the entire room. I checked my electric meter while it was on, and it wasn’t drawing a major amount of energy either. Nice little heater. Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy I

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect and it warmth the room within minutes
customer_reviews.text: Since I live alone in a medium sized room, it is perfect for me. It's economic in cost and works to my satisfaction. It keeps the room warm enough to survive a cold day. It's wise makes it even portable and I carry it sometimes to friend's place when we meet. The overheat sensor makes it safer than other heaters in the same cost range. I have recommended this product to my friends and colleagues.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Little heater that puts out a lot of heat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little heater to take to work. It was freezing in the office and I needed something by my feet. Worked great. Small and inconspicuous. Weather warmed up so I brought it home. My boyfriend used it in the bathroom in our basement, kicked it over and broke it. This is why men are not allowed to have nice things. It’s a good heater tho. You could even put it on your desk.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little heater
customer_reviews.text: This ceramic heater is so small and just over 3 pounds, but it keeps me toasty warm. My husband is always hot so the central heat is only on 68 and I freeze. Now I have my new best friend to help me get through the winter, complete with handle so I can take it from the bedroom to the tv room. I like it pointing at me about 24 inches from my feet, heaven! It has 3 settings, a quit fan and shuts off for safety if it falls over.
customer_reviews.author: florence figurelli

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have this under my desk at work and use it every day! It’s soooooo nice for someone like me who gets cold all of the time. I wear my pants rolled up sometimes and then it turns my ankles/feet red. I then get asked “why are your feet sunburned” or “oh where did you go this weekend” because people assume the sun did it. I’ll let them think that for now.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Harden

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoyed this heater, pumps out a lot of heat and covers the basement nicely (townhouse, large sized room). It is also one of the only heaters I've ever had that I've actually seen turn off when too hot - I had a tray of coins in front of it and it would shut off when too hot - honestly I was impressed. This unit is a lot more quiet than my past one however it isn't silent. When I sleep with it on it's actually some nice white noise but not disruptive or annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Angela J Kyllo

customer_reviews.title: Started making a loud squeeking noise
customer_reviews.text: Purchased end of September 2018. Has been working until now (May 2019). Suddenly started to make a loud squealing noise. Afraid to use it now. Can not find a phone number to call the manufacturer. Would like to get a replacement, but there doesn't seem to be a way to contact Brightown. Dissapointed with lack of warranty information as well. There is a link on Amazon's site to go to brightowns website and there is zero warranty information on their site. Gave 1 star because it did work for a few months, and zero stars was not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It seemed like it was cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one based on reviews here. It was not working upon arrival. One of the knobs was loose and moving freely. It seemed like it was cheaply made. I returned it. Not trying again
customer_reviews.author: nata

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE - Customer Service works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these heaters to use as needed in various rooms. They've lasted less than 2 months and all three have burned out, pushing only cold air. UPDATE: Brightown Customer Service reached out to me regarding their product and offered to replace at no cost the heaters which did not work. Since I had already replaced the heaters, Brightown then refunded my money in full. I thank them for working to make this right. I have updated their rating based on their efforts to work with me on this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Edwards

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working after only a few months
customer_reviews.text: This product quit after the warranty (6 months) had expired (after 8 months) . It was used in my den and was not exposed to damp or humidity. Since it doesn't work very long, I do not recommend it. And of course it was not used all summer so has a very short life. Buy another brand with a better warranty!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased March 2019. January 2020 started working intermittently for several seconds then turns completely off, light goes out, heater goes off and nothing for several hours. Then the process begins all over again. Seems like a hazard since I only run it at night. Worked fine until January 2020. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd chance
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I received a new heater. Customer service was awesome, they asked me if I wanted a refund or a heater. I requested a heater. Hopefully this one last me a long time. I bought this heater on 12/19/18 it only lasted me a month. It died on me a week ago. So disappointed. I only used it like 10 times. I’m going to see if I can get my money back. Don’t waste your money it’s not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppingislife

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch
customer_reviews.text: I'll start by saying that I was very skeptical when this package arrived, it was tiny! Of course the dimensions were listed in the product description but I obviously didn't pay close attention. But this little heater works hard! I'm using it for my home office which is subterranean and thus quite chilly in the Winter. It is all I need to stay warm and cozy while at my desk. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: bionicgirl

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working properly 6 weeks later. I used it a few times a day to warm up the small room and then turned it off so it wouldn't be on for long periods of time. Now, I turn it on and it doesn't even warm up my room. Can't even get a refund for it. And now I have to buy another one because the winters are really cold where I am. Just go ahead and spend a little more money on a space heater. It'll be worth it
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste You Money
customer_reviews.text: I've had this heater for a little over 3 months. About 2.5 months into it, it just completely stopped working. It won't turn on at all unless you flip the heater upside down. It makes no sense. I have no clue why or how this happened! Don't waste your money!!!! (I bought a cheap one from Walmart 6 years ago that still works, this one barely even made it through winter!)
customer_reviews.author: Chioma Udemgba

customer_reviews.title: Died after one month!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this heater!! It smelled like something was burning after about 3 weeks of using it and then it died a month later and I wasn't allowed to return it. Spend the money on a real space heater, rather than trying to go the cheap route like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Coury

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a perfect! I use it to warm up my chilly office. It also came in handy when our furnace quit working. It kept a medium sized room warm enough to keep the cold at bay. It automatically shuts off if it tips over or is picked up. It also automatically turns on/off if a failed to a lower temp. Fun bonus, it looks like a happy face with the dials and light :)
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm and perfect for my desk
customer_reviews.text: Nice and warm and perfect for my desk. A little louder than I'd like, but nothing too bad. Only real complaint is that after several minutes it has to shut down for a few minutes to cool down. Wish it was able to regulate itself better to prevent it from needing to do this, but overall good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Flight

customer_reviews.title: Faulty. Dies within a few months.
customer_reviews.text: This product is faulty. I ordered in oct 2018, less then 4 mo later with regular proper use it died. Got a free replacement of the same thing, only for it to happen yet again. Do not purchase. Faulty product. Ignored by company for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Unit failed after about 3 months
customer_reviews.text: As noted by several other reviews, the button on the bottom of this device malfunctioned, causing it to stop activating. This occurred after approximately 3 months -- suspiciously only days after the manufacturer support window ended. The heater was handled gently the entire time we owned it, and this appears to be a case of inferior craftsmanship or planned obsolescence. A mechanically-inclined person might be able to repair it, but for anyone else, I strongly recommend avoiding this brand.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good little heater
customer_reviews.text: Nice low price for a great heater. I use this heater daily and it puts out a lot of heat on the high setting. My cats sit in my lap so they too can enjoy the warmth. Once I've warmed up I turn to the lower setting and stay comfortable throughout the evening. It has an automatic shut off if it tips over, a feature I appreciate for safety reasons.
customer_reviews.author: V. Forrest

customer_reviews.title: For such a small heater it really puts out a lot of heat.
customer_reviews.text: For such a small heater it really puts out a lot of heat. I bought a second one a few weeks after the first one was delivered. The second one had the safety feature upgraded. Unfortunately the safety feature on the first one was too delicate for my job. The upgraded version has lasted over a year. Still pumps heat like its brand new. This thing cooks you within 8ft. Very much worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Adorno

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could warm up my home office space without having to heat up the whole house. It heated up the room in about 15 minutes and kept it at temp the whole time. It is a wonderful product. It arrived on time and well wrapped so it wouldn't get damaged during shipping, I appreciated that. I would recommend this product if you need to heat up a small space. The safety feature worked, I tipped it over on purpose to see if it worked, and it shut off right away.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little heater!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little heater it is perfect!! We use it in the bathroom, it may say not to but I’ve never had any issues using mine in the bathroom it keeps everything warm and dries it up quickly so it reduces moisture and mold from trying to grow! It gets nice and warm, I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenziekoo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Heater
customer_reviews.text: My main heater no longer works so I had to buy one of these for each room, including the living room. I never expected it heat the entire living room anyway but it does an adequate job. Just point in your general direction and you’ll get toasty soon enough. I also like the fact that it is also fan and that it automatically turns off should it tip over.
customer_reviews.author: talkfan

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long. Had to throw it away
customer_reviews.text: Received this on November 27th and by March 4th it decided to die. At first it would just randomly shut off and wouldn’t turn back on until I let it sit for a little bit then It would work again. Then it started making a horrific squealing sound. I would have to turn it off and mess with the dials to get it to stop then eventually it just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole bailey

customer_reviews.title: Used daily for a year for white noise until it started smoking
customer_reviews.text: I used this heater every day for about a year in my bedroom because I really liked the white noise it would make. I wasn't using heat, just the fan almost every night while sleeping and one day it just didn't work. It actually started smelling like burnt plastic and started smoking when I tried using it. I'd buy again because of the sound alone
customer_reviews.author: Alex Caprara

customer_reviews.title: Heater stopped working within 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews but I want to help the consumer to be wise on buying products, merchandise online. I bought this heater late November of 2018. I used it for 4 months, suddenly, it quit working. I don't recommend this product. Pay more for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Magat

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I immediately noticed a rattling sound from the heater but I plugged it in anyway. The heater turned on and heated up for a couple of minutes, then started producing a burning smell and powered off. Now it won't turn back on. I noticed there's a hole in the back of the unit and one of the blades on the fan is broken off.
customer_reviews.author: 420chubbylover69

customer_reviews.title: Helps warm the room very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at the efficiency of this tiny product!!! The room gets warm and cozy in few minutes, especially when changing clothes in the morning bbbrrrrrr :) I will definitely order 2 more for my kiddos room and the office. My biggest bonus is that it turns off when it's knocked down, the on/off button is located at the bottom and when the heater falls down, it goes off and there is no risk for fire, especially when used around kids. ;)
customer_reviews.author: F.L.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2- both quit working after a week.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for our offices. At first they would just shut off randomly and come back on for a short time after waiting awhile. Now we can't even get them back on. Frustrating because we are SO cold. When they did work, they did push some good heat for a few minutes before shutting off, but now they are garbage. Would really like refund on these.
customer_reviews.author: Holl T.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I like it for my office because it reaches the heat level and then clicks off and back in when temp drops. I have on for bathroom and that one is more powerful than this but this is perfect for office. Live the tip over shut off feature.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Super product. Only bad thing is it doesn't oscillate.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't like about this product is it did not oscillate. But that is my fault for not reading the description well enough. This thing kicks out a lot of heat. I have it in a medium-sized room in the doorway and it gets almost unbearable if it is left on the highest settings on both knobs for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this heater would be a good purchase and so far it is. It warms up my bedroom quickly and the heat feels great. It may seem to sound loud in my room but if you stand right outside my bedroom with the door closed you can't hear it. If the heater is picked up or knocked over it automatically shuts off so that is great protection. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ess

customer_reviews.title: stopped working properly about 30 days after i purchased
customer_reviews.text: So i've had space heaters at work for years....i've had two previously and they both last years. I purchased this one just two months ago and about a month ago it started shutting off and it's not because the room is too warm. I'm in an office space as I was with my previous one (also had an auto-shut off ), so there's plenty of cold air all around me all day. I've turned on/off, unplugged, waited, sometimes for hours and nothing. Then suddenly it works again. Again, first 30 days, never shut off......and now that it's even colder in the office (it's summer time), it's cutting off.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I used this only for 8 months but it heated up our room fairly quickly for its size and was very useful for dreadful MidWest winters. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Anonim

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: This was a bad purchase, the product is not working. It worked for just a couple of months. Terrible & now I can't contact the seller because ita not showing in my app.
customer_reviews.author: Samone N.

customer_reviews.title: The “safety button” breaks, and or becomes stuck... causing it NOT to work anymore!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible!! Horrible item!!! I’ve owned it a month... and it doesn’t work now. As the “safety button” on the bottom has become logged, and won’t turn the unit on any more!!!! Bought one before and the button fell off in 3 weeks!! SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: love

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!! !excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Heats my entire kitchen toasty warm!!! Half price of what my local hardware store I was asking for it. Thinking about getting another one for another room. Don’t know what I would’ve done without that this winter
customer_reviews.author: Momorama

customer_reviews.title: Small, efficient portable heater
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful unit! Easy to set automatic operation, which thermostatically adjusts to the ambient temperature, in spite of people opening the door from an outer area with much different temperature repeatedly. The safety feature is its turning off immediately if turned over. Also economical and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: George P Walker, III, MD

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one winter and that
customer_reviews.text: Updated review! Only lasted less than a year (really one season). Went to turn it on this morning and nothing. Going back to buying Vornado, they are more expensive initially but last for a few years at least.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse11

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: It is very effective at heating up my room in a few minutes, even when the heater is placed on the other side of the room from my desk. The auto-turn off function when it is tilted works as does the thermostat control, and while it is not silent, the noise when it's operating isn't distracting and doesn't prevent me from sleeping. The other negative is that there was a very strong smell when I first used it, but that smell went away with subsequent uses. I'd highly recommend if you're looking for a lightweight heater to warm up a room!
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This little heater worked fine for occasional use. Pulled it out last week since it's getting cooler in the mornings where we live and it doesn't even work. I haven't even had it a year yet! Of course it's to late to return it so in my opinion it's just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: mlbajorek

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working EXACTLY 1 year after purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It was working great, running for an average of 10 hours a week for a small school office room, perfect size and nice heat output. Came in this morning and it won't even turn on. It appears that it has lasted 1 year and now it's done. So disappointed. The manufacturer website offers no on formation. Unless you only want the product to last you 1 year, DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It ia perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: It ia perfect!!!!! Its sound is really soft. Now I can sleep all night comfortable. Thanks a lot.. I recommend it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater.
customer_reviews.text: A great little heater that can be set low at 700 watts or higher at 1500 watts. It uses a regular plug for older houses. Turns off if tilted. It’s a loud little heater but that does not bother me. I like the white noise to sleep by.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: This product does give off good heat. I purchased 3 units and 2 of them have already stopped working. The safety switch on the bottom no longer resets so the unit no longer turns on. I live in Florida and use it only 2-3 months of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Update Review
customer_reviews.text: I have this heater for four months. I started to really use it the last two months. Sometimes it would just shut off, possibly due to overheating but then it would take a whole day to restart it. Also the automatic shut off button on the bottom is really flimsy. Now it just wont turn on at all for me. Im very disappointed. My last heater I had for three years and this one didnt last nearly as long. The time for me to return it has past and now Im purchasing another heater, different brand and am hoping for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO QUALITY CONTROL AT ALL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't plug it in because the plug was not compatible with any socket. I bought an extension cord to plug it in and the light did not go on. When I moved the selection dial it went from off to fan and wouldn't move to other selections, but it seemed to work on the lower heat setting, except that it wouldn't go to the "off" setting and I had to unplug it. Obviously, the switch was broken! It worked for a couple of days that that, but failed completely. This unit was never tested!
customer_reviews.author: Francine Matson

customer_reviews.title: A very effective heater for any room
customer_reviews.text: I just received this awesome little heater to take the chill out of my bedroom. It does a wonderful job at heating up the room in a short amount of time. By the time I'm ready to go to bed I can turn it off and sleep in comfort. The only thing I wish it had a thermostat reading that would show what the temp. was and that it would shut off automatically when the room has reached the desired temp. Other than that I would recommend this heater!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna K Moore
